data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Drew Fischer awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Portland have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Jaroslaw Niezgoda.
Great play from Jorge Villafana to set up the goal.
In the minute 7, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Portland have a goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
In the minute 11, Portland to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
Diego Valeri (Portland) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Portland have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Portland.
Important block from the LA Galaxy defence as Eryk Williamson fires in a strike for Portland.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In the minute 19, Portland move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Jaroslaw Niezgoda is the scorer with a header!
Pablo Bonilla with an assist there.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Portland.
In the minute 22, Free kick Portland.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
An attacking Portland player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Diego Valeri smashes in a penalty at Providence Park. The score is now 3-0.
Drew Fischer awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Portland.
In the minute 35, LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for LA Galaxy, close to Portland's area.
In the minute 45, At Providence Park the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Providence Park.
Diego Valeri of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 46, Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's first substitution at Providence Park with Sebastian Lletget replacing Julian Araujo.
The away team replace Carlos Harvey with Sacha Kljestan.
Cristian Pavon puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 46, Yony Gonzalez instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
In the minute 48, LA Galaxy's Daniel Steres is on target but unsuccessful.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy are caught offside.
In the minute 50, Drew Fischer signals a Portland throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
Portland drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Portland.
In the minute 54, Cristian Pavon (LA Galaxy) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Can LA Galaxy capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
In the minute 58, In Portland LA Galaxy drive forward through Cristian Pavon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Sebastian Lletget (LA Galaxy) strikes at Providence Park but his header is cleared.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Providence Park.
Goal! Portland extend their lead to 4-1 through Eryk Williamson.
Great play from Jaroslaw Niezgoda to set up the goal.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a first substitution, with Andy Polo replacing Andres Flores.
The home team have replaced Pablo Bonilla with Marco Farfan. This is the second substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
Drew Fischer awards Portland a goal kick.
In Portland, Portland push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 70, Portland have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Portland pushes forward through Diego Valeri, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Portland.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Felipe Mora is replacing Jaroslaw Niezgoda for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 74, Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's third substitution at Providence Park with Diedie Traore replacing Emiliano Insua.
Andy Polo puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 5-1.
Yimmi Chara with an assist there.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
LA Galaxy's Sacha Kljestan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portland defender.
In the minute 78, LA Galaxy are coming forward and Yony Gonzalez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 81, Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Drew Fischer signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Portland's half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Eryk Williamson with Renzo Zambrano. This is the fourth substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Tomas Conechny is on a sub for Yimmi Chara for Portland.
In the minute 85, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 88, In Portland LA Galaxy's Rolf Feltscher is caught offside.
Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Free kick LA Galaxy.
Drew Fischer signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in Portland's half.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Tomas Conechny for Portland gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Portland.
Full-time! The final score is 5-2.
Cristian Pavon keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 5-2.
